ingredients: 6 smoked turkey and duck sausages (such as Gerhard's) or turkey kielbasa, halved lengthwise (about 1 1/4 pounds)
5 cups thinly sliced green cabbage (about 1 1/2 pounds)
1/4 cup whole-grain mustard (such as Arran Whole Seed Herb Mustard)
1 teaspoon chopped fresh or 1/4 teaspoon dried thyme
